label: CKM Matrix Elements
mathematical_goal: Derive CKM matrix elements from geometric mixing angles in G2 manifold
theoretical_significance: The CKM matrix describes quark flavor mixing. In PM, the Cabibbo angle emerges from the geometric structure: sin(theta_C) = 1/sqrt(b3/2) = 1/sqrt(12). The Wolfenstein parameter lambda = 0.2247 matches the PDG 2024 value to 0.1sigma. The hierarchical structure A*lambda^2, A*lambda^3 follows from the nested holonomy structure of G2.
